com.kloudtek.systyrant.host

Class SshHost

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kloudtek.systyrant.host.AbstractHost
      • com.kloudtek.systyrant.host.SshHost
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Host, Startable, Stoppable

    public class SshHost
extends AbstractHost
    Host implementation that uses SSH to remotely administer a server.

        @NotNull
public FileInfo getFileInfo(java.lang.String path)
                     throws STRuntimeException
        Description copied from interface: Host
        Retrieve file details. Please note this will throw an exception if the file doesn't exist. If you are not sure of the file presence, please use Host.fileExists(String) first.
        Parameters:
        path - DataFile path
        Returns:
        FileInfo object.
        Throws:
        STRuntimeException - If an error occured while retrieving file details, or if the file doesn't exist.
